Drive on the Pacific Rim Highway with stunning with views of the rugged coastline and lush rainforest. The journey continues to Northern Vancouver Island with secluded beaches and glimpses of wildlife in their natural habitat. HIGHLIGHTS: Discover the famous Butchart Gardens, Malahat Skywalk Explore the magnificent beaches in Tofino with options to surf, kayak or relax Hike secluded trails in ancient rainforest among national parks Whale watching at Campbell River (optional) Stunning views of the rugged coastline and lush rainforest Standard Room (7 Nights) Travel Dates: 5 Jul - 16 Aug 26 Twin per person fr $5,842 Travel Dates: 10 May - 24 May 26, 7 Jun - 21 Jun 26 & 30 Aug - 27 Sep 26 Twin per person fr $5,366 Note: Two seasonal departure dates: Low Season: 10, 24 May, 08, 21 Jun, 30 Aug, 13 , 27 Sep 26 High Season: 05, 19 Jul, 02, 16 Aug 26 ^ Full day tour from Vancouver can be booked before or after the multi day tour, tour date must be requested at time of booking.
